searchableProductInfo.details: Neon-lime patent croc-effect leather (Cow)Top handle and detachable shoulder strapMagnetic-fastening tabs at front, designer-embossed brass-tone hardwareInternal pouch and zip-fastening pocketsFully lined in snakeskin-print canvasTwist-lock fasteningDesigner color: Fluoro Lime
searchableProductInfo.title: Neon croc-effect leather shoulder bag
searchableProductInfo.editorsNotes: Color-pop brights are a fabulous way to accent your look, so make like the Marc Jacobs models and choose splashes of neon-lime to stand out from the crowd. We love this croc-effect patent-leather shoulder bag from the designer's Cruise collection - clash it against a muted palette for an electrifying finish.Shown here with: T by Alexander Wang cardigan, Kain tank, Bottega Veneta bracelet, Reed Krakoff skirt, Kors Michael Kors shoes.
